description:
Description
A Turn Based Action RPG!
Try the demo first! https://sidequestvr.com/app/549/arcaxer-demo
Important! This is the Pre-Release version of Arcaxer. This version features more content than the demo version but is still in development and is not a finished game.
Arcaxer is a turn based RPG with first person action oriented combat, and a 3rd person god-view overworld. 
In the overworld you will explore procedural dungeons to find equips and new abilities for your character. You can also explore the hub world to interact with NPC's and buy new items with the credits that you earn in the dungeon.  
Even though combat is turn based you must dodge enemy attacks with your body, and aim and time your own attacks with gestures. Can you make it to the top of "The Stack"?  
Player Classes
Choose fighter, thief, or mage to drastically change which abilities you learn as you explore the dungeons.  
Fighter: A class with a focus on physical attacks 
Mage: A class with a focus on Hax, the game's special abilities.
Thief: A class that requires skill and precision to use properly  
Procedurally Generated Dungeons
The Stack is a huge procedurally generated dungeon filled with random enemies and loot. The dungeon changes as you get higher including more dangerous traps and enemies.
This is an early demo of a game in development and may have bugs, balance, and performance issues.  
Join the discord to get early builds and more! https://discord.gg/BCqy2m3
Latest Major Update: 1.38.0

Added experimental "PAssthrough Mixed Reality" mode.
